metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

This workbook is designed to help find errors, trends, users experiencing many errors etc. 

### Tabs
Each tab breaks the workbook into specific sections, each with their own goal.

#### Overview 
High level view of errors, errors by region, errors by top 5 users, code symbolic, & Hostpool. As well as alerts found in AVD related subscriptions*

It is possible alerts unrelated to AVD show up, as alerts can be setup and homed in any Subscription. Further refinement may be needed on finding alerts related to only AVD resources.

#### User Performance
Displays metrics related to User Profile size, Profile load time, logon time, RTT Metrics.

#### Errors
Offers three experiences. One is "guided" where by the user can select the specific error source, hostpool etc. All tiles are selectable and change the subsequent queries.

The second option is "search" which allows a user to search the logs by a CorrelationID or a Username and then displays information for that user, and all the logs for that CorrelationId session or User, depending on what was entered into the text box.

The third option also allows entering a username or CorrelationId, but it is not required. It allows parameter selection of WVD logs and then creates a dynamic list of session hosts based on the error(s) selected and brings in the Event logs for those session hosts.","style":"success"},"conditionalVisibility":{"parameterName":"help","comparison":"isEqualTo","value":"yes"},"name":"text - 12"},{"type":11,"content":{"version":"LinkItem/1.0","style":"tabs","links":[{"id":"268bb2a7-2741-49eb-9bd9-3f39f6125bf3","cellValue":"tab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Overview","subTarget":"inventory","style":"link"},{"id":"960e8a31-2d71-4f5e-9b4c-78c079b94583","cellValue":"tab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"User Performance","subTarget":"user","style":"link"},{"id":"1bc33fa0-1a45-4dc5-afa7-68416d86e9af","cellValue":"tab","linkTarget":"parameter","linkLabel":"Errors","subTarget":"logs","style":"link"}]},"name":"links - 2"},{"type":1,"content":{"json":"## How to Use the Errors Tab

        | where UserName =~ "{userMatch}"
        | where (Name=="ProfileLoggedOff" or Name=="ODFCLoggedOff") and (Source=="RDAgent" or Source=="FSLogix")
        | extend HostPool=_ResourceId, ProfileType=iff(Name=="ProfileLoggedOff","Profile","ODFC")
        | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by UserName, _ResourceId, ProfileType
        | extend VHDSizeOnDisk=todouble(replace_string(replace_string(tostring(Parameters.VHDSizeOnDisk),",",""),".","")),
                VHDFreeSpace=todouble(replace_string(tostring(Parameters.VHDFreeSpace),",",".")),
                VHDMaxSize=todouble(replace_string(tostring(Parameters.MaxVHDSize),",","."))
        | where VHDSizeOnDisk!=""
        | project UserName, ProfileType, VHDSizeOnDisk, VHDFreeSpace, VHDMaxSize, Usage=100*(VHDMaxSize - VHDFreeSpace)/VHDMaxSize
        |  extend bag = pack("UserName",UserName,"ProfileType",ProfileType, "VHD Size On Disk",VHDSizeOnDisk,"VHD Free Space",VHDFreeSpace,"VHD Max Size", VHDMaxSize,"Usage", Usage)
    | summarize tostring(makelist(bag))","crossComponentResources":["{Workspaces}"],"isHiddenWhenLocked":true,"timeContext":{"durationMs":2592000000},"queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"}],"style":"pills","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"},"name":"parameters - 7"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let GetDaysInTimeRange = (Period:timespan) {
    // Get the number of days in the period, note the period MUST be longer than 1 day, and in full days
    max_of(toint(round(Period/1d, 0)), 1);
};
let GetTimespanAverage = (Time:timespan, Period:timespan) {
    // Get the number of days in the period, note the period MUST be longer than 1 day, and in full days
    let Days = GetDaysInTimeRange(Period);
    // Total hours is the number of days*24, plus the hours
    let TotalHours = toint(format_timespan(Time, "d")) * 24 + toint(format_timespan(Time, "H"));
    // Calculate the average hours
    let AvgHours = TotalHours / Days;
    // We're rounding down for the average, figure out fractional hours left 
    let MinuteResidue = toint(((1.0*TotalHours/Days) - AvgHours) * 60);
    // Total minutes is the number of minutes plus the residue from above
    let TotalMinutes = toint(format_timespan(Time, "m")) + MinuteResidue;
    // Calculate average minutes
    let AvgMinutes =  toint(round(todouble(TotalMinutes) / Days));
    // Pad with zero if necessary
    let MinuteStr = iif(AvgMinutes < 10, strcat("0", AvgMinutes), tostring(AvgMinutes));
    let Result = strcat("~ ", AvgHours, ":", MinuteStr, " h");
    iif(Time/1s > 0, Result, '');
};
let ProbeRange = range ProbeDay from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 1d | extend JoinKey=1;
WVDConnections
| where UserName == "{userMatch}"
| as UserConnections
| where State == "Started" and TimeGenerated <= {TimeRange:end}
| extend StartTime = TimeGenerated
| join kind=rightouter
(
    UserConnections
    | where State == "Completed"
    | extend EndTime = TimeGenerated
) on CorrelationId
| extend StartTime = min_of(coalesce(StartTime, {TimeRange:start}), EndTime), UserName=coalesce(UserName,UserName1) // If the start time has fallen out of retention, it should not be set to after the EndTime
| where StartTime between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end}) or // Connections starting in our date range
        EndTime   between ({TimeRange:start} .. {TimeRange:end}) or // Connections ending in our date range
        (StartTime <= {TimeRange:start} and EndTime >= {TimeRange:end}) // Connections that started before and ended after the range
| extend EndTime=min_of(EndTime, {TimeRange:end})-1s, StartTime=max_of(StartTime,{TimeRange:start})+1s // Crop connections to within the report boundary
| extend Duration = EndTime-StartTime
| sort by ClientType asc // Sort for Clients string to be homogenous
| as UserUsage
| join kind=leftouter
(
    WVDCheckpoints
    | where (Name == "LaunchExecutable" and Parameters.connectionStage == "RdpShellAppExecuted") or Name=="RdpShellAppExecuted"
    | project CorrelationId, Parameters=tostring(Parameters.filename)
) on CorrelationId
| summarize AppsToStartConnection=dcount(ResourceAlias),
            AppsUsed=dcount(Parameters),
            Connections=dcount(CorrelationId),
            Time=sum(Duration),
            ClientCount=dcount(ClientType)
            by UserName
| join kind=leftouter 
(
    // Count days with usage
    UserUsage
    | extend JoinKey = 1
    | join kind=fullouter ProbeRange on JoinKey
    | make-series ConnectedToday=dcountif(CorrelationId, bin(ProbeDay, 1d) == bin(StartTime, 1d) or 
                                                bin(ProbeDay, 1d) == bin(EndTime, 1d) or 
                                                bin(ProbeDay, 1d) between (bin(StartTime, 1d)..bin(EndTime, 1d)))
                on ProbeDay from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step 1d by UserName
    | mv-expand ProbeDay to typeof(datetime), ConnectedToday to typeof(int)
    | summarize Days=countif(ConnectedToday > 0) by UserName
) on UserName
| join kind = leftouter(WVDErrors | where UserName == "{userMatch}" | summarize Errors = dcountif(CorrelationId, isnotempty(CodeSymbolic)) by UserName) on UserName
| project
    ['Days in time range']=GetDaysInTimeRange({TimeRange:end} - {TimeRange:start}),
    ['Days with usage']=coalesce(Days, 0),
    ['Apps to start connection']=coalesce(AppsToStartConnection, 0),
    ['Apps used']=coalesce(AppsUsed, 0),
    ['Connection count']=coalesce(Connections, 0),
    ['Connection time']=strcat("~ ", toint(format_timespan(Time, 'd'))*24+toint(format_timespan(Time, 'H')), ":", format_timespan(Time, 'mm'), " h"),
    Errors,
    ['Average daily time']=GetTimespanAverage(Time,{TimeRange:end} - {TimeRange:start}),
    ['Client count']=coalesce(ClientCount, 0)
| evaluate narrow()
| project Metric=replace(@"\[|'|\]", "", Column), Value","size":3,"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","crossComponentResources":["{Workspaces}"],"visualization":"tiles","tileSettings":{"titleContent":{"columnMatch":"Metric","formatter":1},"leftContent":{"columnMatch":"Value","formatter":12,"formatOptions":{"palette":"auto"}},"showBorder":true}},"customWidth":"50","name":"query - 2","styleSettings":{"showBorder":true}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"let newSessions = true;
let wvdProfile = materialize(datatable(row:string)['{wvdprofile}']
| project row = todynamic(row)
| mv-expand row
| evaluate bag_unpack(row));
WVDConnections
| as ConnectionData
| where State == "Started"
| where UserName =~ "{userMatch}"
| join kind = leftsemi
(
    // Only include connections that actually reached the host to prevent short (failed) attempts from skewing the data
    WVDCheckpoints
    | where Source == "RDStack" and Name == "RdpStackConnectionEstablished"
) on CorrelationId
| join kind = inner
(
    WVDCheckpoints // new session
    | where newSessions
    | where Name =~ "ShellReady" or
    ( Name =~ "LaunchExecutable" and Parameters.connectionStage == "RdpShellAppExecuted" or Name=~"RdpShellAppExecuted")
    | project ProductiveTime=TimeGenerated, CorrelationId
    | summarize ProductiveTime=min(ProductiveTime) by CorrelationId
    | union ( 
        ConnectionData // existent Sessions
        | where not(newSessions)
        | where State == "Connected"
        | project ProductiveTime=TimeGenerated, CorrelationId
        )
) on CorrelationId
| join kind = leftouter
(  
    WVDCheckpoints
    | where Name =~ "OnCredentialsAcquisitionCompleted"
    | project CorrelationId, credaquire = Parameters.DurationMS
) on CorrelationId
| join kind = leftouter
(  
    WVDCheckpoints
    | where Name =~ "SSOTokenRetrieval" or Name == "ODFCLoggedOn" or Name == "ProfileLoggedOn"
    | project CorrelationId, LoadTime = Parameters.DurationMS, Name
) on CorrelationId
| summarize AvgLogonTime = avgif(((ProductiveTime - TimeGenerated) / 1s - (coalesce(credaquire,0)/1000) - (coalesce(LoadTime,0)/1000)),Name == "SSOTokenRetrieval"),
            AvgProfileTime = avgif(((ProductiveTime - TimeGenerated) / 1s - (coalesce(LoadTime,0)/1000)),Name == "ODFCLoggedOn" or Name == "ProfileLoggedOn")
        by UserName
| project UserName, AvgLogonTime, AvgProfileTime
 | join kind = leftouter (wvdProfile) on UserName
| project-away UserName1
